      • takePicture

        public Picture takePicture(java.io.File path,
                  Bitmap imgOnDisplay,
                  java.lang.String albumName)
        Saves the Bitmap provided to the file path provided and adds the appropriate information to the DB.
        Parameters:
        path - File directory where the Picture is to be saved
        imgOnDisplay - Bitmap to save
